Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Kaggle is a leading global platform for data science and machine learning, owned by Google. It provides an interactive community for data scientists, researchers, and enthusiasts, particularly renowned for hosting data science competitions. However, one of Kaggle's most notable features is its publicly available dataset repository, which makes these resources accessible to anyone for research, learning, or project development.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
Rich Data Resources: Kaggle boasts tens of thousands of publicly available datasets that span a wide range of fields, from healthcare and finance to natural language processing and computer vision. These datasets are contributed by individual users, companies, and organizations, ensuring diversity and breadth.

Easy Access: Most datasets are free and openly accessible. Users only need to register an account to browse, download, and use these datasets. This openness greatly promotes knowledge sharing and technological advancement.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, South America, Europe, Australia (continent)
